melike.title: A Different Kind of Celebration
melike.story: Breakthrough began with a simple wish: to create something worth gathering for‚Äîsomething outside of birthdays, graduations, and the big obvious milestones. We wanted to shine a light on the quieter moments that shape us: the personal projects that finally get finished, the hard conversations we learn from, or the shift in mindset that no one sees but you. These are the breakthroughs that truly matter. And we believe they deserve a space.

jonas.title: Where Ideas Turn Into Experiences
jonas.story: Each year, Breakthrough takes on a new theme and transforms it into a one-day event that's part social experiment, part creative challenge. From board games to LEGO, from deep talks to unexpected activities, the format changes‚Äîbut the feeling stays the same. It's a space where curiosity leads the way, where people come not just to be inspired, but to build something together‚Äîwhether that's ideas, confidence, or connection.

our_story.title: For the Curious and Open-Minded
our_story.story: Breakthrough is free and open to anyone who wants to explore new ways of learning, reflecting, and growing‚Äîwith others. We're a growing community of curious minds, fueled by thoughtful themes, local collaboration, and a shared belief that the small stuff is actually the big stuff. If you're the kind of person who loves fresh perspectives, honest conversations, and playful ways to grow‚Äîthen we'd love to have you.

pre_wedding.title: Breakthrough 2024: Project YOU
pre_wedding.description: A day dedicated to personal projects‚Äîbringing people together to work on something meaningful instead of doing it alone.

post_wedding.title: 2023 ‚Äì Reflect & Celebrate
post_wedding.description: A cozy end-of-year gathering where we took a moment to pause and look back. Each participant shared one thing they were proud of, one thing they struggled with, and one hope for the coming year. Through storytelling, reflection, and laughter, we celebrated the messy journey of personal growth.

post_post_wedding.title: 2022 ‚Äì The Beginning
post_post_wedding.description: Launched during the challenges of the pandemic, our first event was a small board game night that laid the foundation for Breakthrough. As a fun twist, each guest entered to the surprise of a personalized theme song and applause‚Äîa light-hearted way to set the tone and make everyone feel welcome from the moment they walked in.

gift_registry.presence: Your presence at our wedding is the greatest gift, and we are so excited to celebrate this special day with you!
gift_registry.description1: For those who would still like to give, we are happy with anything that feels meaningful to you. If you'd like to support us as we start this new chapter, which possibly involves moving abroad for our master's degrees, monetary contributions, as is Turkish tradition, would be especially appreciated as we plan for our future together. breakfast.title: Breakfast & Catch-up
breakfast.description: For the coffee lovers, the slow risers, and the morning-fresh‚Äîbuns, tea, and good company await the early birds.

kickoff.title: Kick-off & Welcome
kickoff.description: This is where it all begins‚Äîso don't be late! We'll set the tone for a fun and engaging day with a bit of teambuilding to get everyone connected.

presentation.title: Victor Winste√©n: Lean ‚Äì The Industry's Answer to Efficiency & Teamwork
presentation.description: Lean isn't just a corporate mantra‚Äîit's a mindset that empowers teams to solve problems together and drive continuous improvement. With hands-on experience optimizing production at Novo Nordisk, Victor brings a fresh and engaging perspective on how Lean principles can boost business performance and even apply to everyday life.

workshop1.title: Workshop: Welcome to the LEGO Factory
workshop1.description: Time to build, improve, and repeat. Experience continuous improvement through hands-on challenges that bring Lean principles to life.

lunch.title: Lunch & Free Building
lunch.description: Refuel with lunch‚Äîto keep the energy going. From here on out, the bricks are yours. Team up to build the big provided LEGO sets (might be different than those in photo) or dive into free building at your own pace. Whether you're hands-on or just soaking up the vibe, it's a moment to relax, recharge, and watch the creations come to life.

workshop2.title: Workshop: Teamwork Unplugged ‚Äì The Deep Dive
workshop2.description: This is the experimental part of the day. Together, we'll explore what makes great teamwork tick‚Äîthrough open conversation, reflection, and shared observations.

freeBuilding.title: Free Building / LEGO Team Exercises
freeBuilding.description: The afternoon flows with the mood of the room. Keep building freely, or dive into exercises from the LEGO Events Toolbox‚Äîfun, hands-on activities designed to strengthen collaboration, creativity, and communication.

closing.title: Wrapping up
closing.description: We'll close the program with key reflections, takeaways, and feedback from the day. But the fun doesn't have to end here...

afterParty.title: After Party & Dinner
afterParty.description: Beers, bricks, and good vibes. We'll move to a nearby venue to unwind together. And for those who'd like to join, we'll have dinner at Mantzius Restaurant at 18:00 after clean-up.
